backend/main.mo: Actor canister implementing user profiles, access control, course management, and subject/topic storage with permission‑gated CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI-related course icon updates and required asset generation for frontend components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text summaries of various frontend files describing their roles in the app’s UI, hooks, styles, and layout.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining color tokens and theming variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file bootstrapping the React frontend via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wiring theming and rendering the main layout including header, hero, courses, subjects, and footer.
frontend/src/components/CoursesSection.t: UI section fetching and displaying courses with category badges, icon mapping, loading skeletons, and fallback handling for missing icons.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with branding, navigation links, subject links, and social media icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with logo, smooth-scroll links, subject dropdown, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: A hero section component with gradient styling, introductory text, and buttons that scroll to course and subject sections.
frontend/src/components/SubjectCard.tsx: Displays a subject card with dynamic topic loading, collapsible topic list, and study material links.
Renders a grid of predefined subjects, each configured for backend-loaded topics using SubjectCard.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating courses, subjects, topics, and subject content via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark rose-themed UI plus scrollbar and base element styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with InternetIdentity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom OKLCH color variables, extended theme settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature states, image requirements, and pending requests for expanding higher‑education course content.
